alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:25PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 800 PM PDT... At 724 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Wells, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall aling with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moor Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County
